article_title: Trump can sell a more entertaining story than Clinton, says Jonah Goldberg

og.description: By conventional rules, Donald Trump should lose to Hillary Clinton in a landslide. But if God were enforcing the conventional rules, Trump would be brooding atop his midtown Manhattan aerie, wondering how he came in last behind James Gilmore.
og.title: Trump can sell a more entertaining story than Clinton, says Jonah Goldberg
